history.narrative: Law 11-124, the “Learner’s Permit Amendment Act of 1996,” was introduced in Council and Assigned Bill No. 11-292, which was referred to the Committee on Public Works and the Environment. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on February 6, 1996, and March 5, 1996, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on March 15, 1996, it was assigned Act No. 11-231 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D. C. Law 11-124 became effective on May 24, 1996.
